data.description:
Looper VR by Looper Studio is a cutting-edge metaverse app that provides users with a fully immersive virtual reality experience. With Looper VR, users can enter a vibrant and dynamic world that's unlike anything they've seen before. The app allows users to create their own customizable avatars, which they can use to explore a range of stunning and interactive virtual environments.

In Looper VR, users can interact with other users from around the world in real time. The app features advanced social and communication tools, including voice chat, that enable users to connect and collaborate with others seamlessly. Whether they want to chat with friends, make new connections, or participate in fun activities, Looper VR provides a platform for users to come together and engage with each other in new and exciting ways.

With its user-friendly interface and stunning graphics, Looper VR is designed to be both entertaining and engaging. Users can choose from a variety of activities, including games, challenges, events, and performances, ensuring that there's always something new and exciting to discover. While the app's primary focus is social and entertainment, it may also offer opportunities for learning and skill-building.

changelog.change_log:
Below, I have detailed the modifications made:

Removal of Advertisements:
In accordance with the Oculus App Policies, I have removed all in-app advertisements, advertisement spaces, and references to advertisements from the application.

Hand Tracking Support:
I apologize for any confusion caused by the initial listing of Hand Tracking as a supported input device. To resolve this issue, I have updated the application description to remove any mention of Hand Tracking support.

Performance Optimization and Frame Rate Improvement:
I have implemented significant performance optimizations by incorporating Application SpaceWarp (AppSW) into the application. As a result, the application now runs smoothly and maintains a stable FPS across all scenes.
